title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
What is the relationship between life expectancy and population? Is there a correlation? Is this correlation causation?? In this page we will run some data analyses to find out (not really the causation part though merely a visualization)!

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


df = pd.read_csv('gapminder.csv')
plt.scatter(df['population_millions'], df['life_expectancy'])
plt.xlabel('Population (in millions)')
plt.ylabel('Life Expectancy')
plt.title('Population vs Life Expectancy')
plt.show()

Afghanistan Analysis

title: Country Analysis
text:
This page analyzes the changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for a specific country over time.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv('gapminder.csv')


# Filter data for Afghanistan
country_data = df[df['country'] == 'Afghanistan'] 
plt.subplot(3, 1, 1)
plt.plot(country_data['year'], country_data['life_expectancy'])
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Life Expectancy')
plt.title('Changes in Life Expectancy over Time')

plt.subplot(3, 1, 2)
plt.plot(country_data['year'], country_data['gdp_per_capita'])


plt.xlabel('Year')

plt.ylabel('GDP per Capita')
plt.title('Changes in GDP per Capita over Time')


plt.subplot(3, 1, 3)
plt.plot(country_data['year'], country_data['population_millions'])
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Population in millions')
plt.title('Changes in Population over Time')

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Population in millions')

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy and GDP
text:
What is the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita? Is there a correlation? In this page we will run some data analyses to find out!

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


df = pd.read_csv('gapminder.csv')
plt.scatter(df['gdp_per_capita'], df['life_expectancy'])
plt.xlabel('GDP per Capita')
plt.ylabel('Life Expectancy')
plt.title('GDP per Capita vs Life Expectancy')
plt.show()
